title: Counting pseudo-Anosovs as weakly contracting isometries
abstract:
We show that pseudo-Anosov mapping classes are generic in every Cayley graph
of the mapping class group of a finite-type hyperbolic surface. Our method also
yields an analogous result for rank-one CAT(0) groups and hierarchically
hyperbolic groups with Morse elements. Finally, we prove that Morse elements
are generic in every Cayley graph of groups that are quasi-isometric to
(well-behaved) hierarchically hyperbolic groups. This gives a quasi-isometry
invariant theory of counting group elements in groups beyond relatively
hyperbolic groups.
